explains: n. （尤指政治上的）过激分子，极端主义者；超级马拉松（ultramarathon的简称）
wordGroup: ultra violet 紫外光；紫外线辐射
ultra vires [律]超越权限（源自于拉丁语）

sentences.en: Not all the glass technology that touches our lives is ultra-modern.
sentences.cn: 并非所有影响我们生活的玻璃技术都是超现代的。

sentences.en: Our cheap, ultra-reliable wired networks made credit-card authentication over the phone frictionless.
sentences.cn: 我们的实惠、超可靠的有线网络使通过电话进行信用卡认证轻而易举。

sentences.en: It is amazing that this ultra-modern TV tower combines ancient concepts such as the spherical pearls, with technology, commerce, recreation, educational and conference facilities of the 21st century.
sentences.cn: 这座超现代的电视塔将古老的概念，如球形的珍珠，和21世纪的技术、商业、娱乐、教育和会议设施相结合，真是很神奇。
